entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
